TextLibrary.Text: Emperor Selentius XVII
I have returned, your Majesty. Have you finished composing your reply to the Queen?
I have returned, your Majesty. Have you finished composing your reply to the Queen?
I have returned, your Majesty. Have you finished composing your reply to the Queen?
I have returned, your Majesty. Have you finished composing your reply to the Queen?
Almost... As I said, it can't be rushed. But, meanwhile, since I have a member of the Agarian Knights here in Selentia, I would be doing my own Empire a disservice if I did not ask one more favor.
Almost... As I said, it can't be rushed. But, meanwhile, since I have a member of the Agarian Knights here in Selentia, I would be doing my own Empire a disservice if I did not ask one more favor.
Almost... As I said, it can't be rushed. But, meanwhile, since I have a member of the Agarian Knights here in Selentia, I would be doing my own Empire a disservice if I did not ask one more favor.
Almost... As I said, it can't be rushed. But, meanwhile, since I have a member of the Agarian Knights here in Selentia, I would be doing my own Empire a disservice if I did not ask one more favor.
Another favor? I remind you that the Queen requires my services as well. Will you assure me that you will have your reply prepared when I return?
Another favor? I remind you that the Queen requires my services as well. Will you assure me that you will have your reply prepared when I return?
Another favor? I remind you that the Queen requires my services as well. Will you assure me that you will have your reply prepared when I return?
Another favor? I remind you that the Queen requires my services as well. Will you assure me that you will have your reply prepared when I return?
Oh, yes, yes, yes! You Agarians are so kind, so thoughtful, so full of honor. We could learn a lot from you...
Oh, yes, yes, yes! You Agarians are so kind, so thoughtful, so full of honor. We could learn a lot from you...
Oh, yes, yes, yes! You Agarians are so kind, so thoughtful, so full of honor. We could learn a lot from you...
Oh, yes, yes, yes! You Agarians are so kind, so thoughtful, so full of honor. We could learn a lot from you...
Indeed! Perhaps I could teach you... AFTER I deliver your reply to my Queen. Now, what is it you want me to do?
Indeed! Perhaps I could teach you... AFTER I deliver your reply to my Queen. Now, what is it you want me to do?
Indeed! Perhaps I could teach you... AFTER I deliver your reply to my Queen. Now, what is it you want me to do?
Indeed! Perhaps I could teach you... AFTER I deliver your reply to my Queen. Now, what is it you want me to do?
It's my daughter, you see. It has been arranged that she is to wed Utrarg of Trarg - leader of the Horse Tribes south of our Empire. The marriage will herald the beginnings of a glorious alliance.
It's my daughter, you see. It has been arranged that she is to wed Utrarg of Trarg - leader of the Horse Tribes south of our Empire. The marriage will herald the beginnings of a glorious alliance.
It's my daughter, you see. It has been arranged that she is to wed Utrarg of Trarg - leader of the Horse Tribes south of our Empire. The marriage will herald the beginnings of a glorious alliance.
It's my daughter, you see. It has been arranged that she is to wed Utrarg of Trarg - leader of the Horse Tribes south of our Empire. The marriage will herald the beginnings of a glorious alliance.
Where exactly do I fit into this... arrangement?
Where exactly do I fit into this... arrangement?
Where exactly do I fit into this... arrangement?
Where exactly do I fit into this... arrangement?
She needs an escort. I want you to travel to Barthel, collect her, and see that she arrives safely in Trarg. Just a short, easy journey. Nothing to it, really.
She needs an escort. I want you to travel to Barthel, collect her, and see that she arrives safely in Trarg. Just a short, easy journey. Nothing to it, really.
She needs an escort. I want you to travel to Barthel, collect her, and see that she arrives safely in Trarg. Just a short, easy journey. Nothing to it, really.
She needs an escort. I want you to travel to Barthel, collect her, and see that she arrives safely in Trarg. Just a short, easy journey. Nothing to it, really.
If the journey is so easy, why do you need me?
If the journey is so easy, why do you need me?
If the journey is so easy, why do you need me?
If the journey is so easy, why do you need me?
Well, you see... my daughter, Serephine, is less than happy about the arrangement. She doesn't want to marry Lord Utrag.
Well, you see... my daughter, Serephine, is less than happy about the arrangement. She doesn't want to marry Lord Utrag.
Well, you see... my daughter, Serephine, is less than happy about the arrangement. She doesn't want to marry Lord Utrag.
Well, you see... my daughter, Serephine, is less than happy about the arrangement. She doesn't want to marry Lord Utrag.
And you want me to change her mind? You need a matchmaker, not a knight!
And you want me to change her mind? You need a matchmaker, not a knight!
And you want me to change her mind? You need a matchmaker, not a knight!
And you want me to change her mind? You need a matchmaker, not a knight!

Heavens no! Not even an influential knight of your stature could change Serephine's mind! No, I just don't trust my guards to escort Serephine. They could easily be seduced, or bribed. But you...well, the Agarian Knights are incorruptible, aren't they?

Heavens no! Not even an influential knight of your stature could change Serephine's mind! No, I just don't trust my guards to escort Serephine. They could easily be seduced, or bribed. But you...well, the Agarian Knights are incorruptible, aren't they?

Heavens no! Not even an influential knight of your stature could change Serephine's mind! No, I just don't trust my guards to escort Serephine. They could easily be seduced, or bribed. But you...well, the Agarian Knights are incorruptible, aren't they?

Heavens no! Not even an influential knight of your stature could change Serephine's mind! No, I just don't trust my guards to escort Serephine. They could easily be seduced, or bribed. But you...well, the Agarian Knights are incorruptible, aren't they?
Fine... fine. I'll complete this task for you. But when I return, I must have your reply.
Fine... fine. I'll complete this task for you. But when I return, I must have your reply.
